channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft-B v1.0.0.4 DOPSoft
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- CNCSoft-B v1.0.0.4 DOPSoft

item.title: CVE-2024-1595|2024-08-22T18:09:41.923Z -- delta%20electronics -- cncsoft-b%20v1.0.0.4%20dopsoft
item.description:
Delta Electronics CNCSoft-B DOPSoft prior to v4.0.0.82
insecurely loads libraries, which may allow an attacker to use DLL hijacking and take over the system where the software is installed.
